verses.name: Genesis 4:9
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Cain, Where is Abel thy brother? And he said, I know not: Am I my brother’s keeper?

verses.name: Genesis 4:10
verses.text: And he said, What hast thou done? the voice of thy brother’s blood crieth unto me from the ground.

verses.name: Genesis 4:11
verses.text: And now art thou cursed from the earth, which hath opened her mouth to receive thy brother’s blood from thy hand;

verses.name: Genesis 4:12
verses.text: When thou tillest the ground, it shall not henceforth yield unto thee her strength; a fugitive and a vagabond shalt thou be in the earth.
